00032 template <class Product>
00033 class TSupplierCompWrap:
00034                      public ibase::CLoggerComponentBase,
00035                      virtual public ISupplier,
00036                      virtual public istd::IChangeable
00037 {
00038 public:
00039        typedef ibase::CLoggerComponentBase BaseClass;
00040        typedef Product ProductType;
00041 
00042        enum MessageId
00043        {
00044               MI_DURATION_TIME = 0x077a1b
00045        };
00046 
00047        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TSupplierCompWrap);
00048               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(ISupplier);
00049               I_ASSIGN(m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr, "DiagnosticName", "Name of this supplier for diagnostic, if it is not set, no diagnostic log message will be send", false, "");
00050               I_ASSIGN(m_paramsSetCompPtr, "ParamsSet", "Parameters set describing model parameter used to produce results", false, "ParamsSet");
00051               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_paramsSetModelCompPtr, m_paramsSetCompPtr, false);
00052               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr, "AdditionalTriggerInputs", "Additional observed trigger inputs, the supplier will be invalidated if some input signal the change", false);
00053        I_END_COMPONENT;
00054 
00055        TSupplierCompWrap();
00056 
00057        // reimplemented (iproc::ISupplier)
00058        virtual void InvalidateSupplier();
00059        virtual void EnsureWorkInitialized();
00060        virtual void EnsureWorkFinished();
00061        virtual void ClearWorkResults();
00062        virtual int GetWorkStatus() const;
00063        virtual iprm::IParamsSet* GetModelParametersSet() const;
00064 
00065 protected:
00070        virtual bool InitializeWork();
00071 
00075        const Product* GetWorkProduct() const;
00076 
00082        virtual void RegisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00087        virtual void UnregisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00088 
00089        // abstract methods
00094        virtual int ProduceObject(Product& result) const = 0;
00095 
00096        // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00097        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00098        virtual void OnComponentDestroyed();
00099 
00100        class InputObserver: public imod::CMultiModelObserverBase
00101        {
00102        public:
00103               InputObserver(TSupplierCompWrap<Product>* parentPtr);
00104 
00105               using imod::CMultiModelObserverBase::EnsureModelsDetached;
00106 
00107        protected:
00108               // reimplemented (imod::CMultiModelObserverBase)
00109               virtual void BeforeUpdate(imod::IModel* modelPtr, int updateFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* updateParamsPtr);
00110 
00111        private:
00112               TSupplierCompWrap<Product>& m_parent;

00116        I_ATTR(QString, m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr);

00132 template <class Product>
00133 TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::TSupplierCompWrap()
00134 :      m_workStatus(WS_INVALID),
00135        m_inputObserver(this),
00136        m_productChangeNotifier(NULL, CF_SUPPLIER_RESULTS | CF_MODEL)
00137 {
00138 }

00141 template <class Product>
00142 iprm::IParamsSet* TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetModelParametersSet() const
00143 {
00144        return m_paramsSetCompPtr.GetPtr();

00148 // pseudo-reimplemented (iproc::ISupplier)
00149 
00150 template <class Product>
00151 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InvalidateSupplier()
00152 {
00153        if (m_workStatus == ISupplier::WS_LOCKED){
00154               return;
00155        }
00156 
00157        if (m_workStatus != ISupplier::WS_INVALID){
00158               m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(this);
00159 
00160               m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_INVALID;
00161        }
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 template <class Product>
00166 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::EnsureWorkInitialized()
00167 {
00168        if (m_workStatus < ISupplier::WS_INIT){
00169               m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(this);
00170 
00171               if (InitializeWork()){
00172                      m_workStatus = WS_INIT;
00173               }
00174               else{
00175                      m_workStatus = WS_CRITICAL;
00176 
00177                      m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(NULL);
00178               }
00179        }
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 template <class Product>
00184 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::EnsureWorkFinished()
00185 {
00186        if (m_workStatus <= ISupplier::WS_INIT){
00187               TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::EnsureWorkInitialized();
00188 
00189               m_workStatus = WS_LOCKED;
00190 
00191               if (!m_productPtr.IsValid()){
00192                      m_productPtr.SetPtr(new Product());
00193               }
00194 
00195               m_workStatus = ProduceObject(*m_productPtr);
00196               I_ASSERT(m_workStatus >= WS_OK);   // No initial states are possible
00197 
00198               m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(NULL);
00199        }
00200 }
00201 
00202 
00203 template <class Product>
00204 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::ClearWorkResults()
00205 {
00206        if (m_workStatus == ISupplier::WS_LOCKED){
00207               return;
00208        }
00209 
00210        if (m_workStatus != ISupplier::WS_INVALID){
00211               m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(this);
00212 
00213               m_productPtr.Reset();
00214 
00215               m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_INVALID;
00216        }
00217 }
00218 
00219 
00220 template <class Product>
00221 int TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetWorkStatus() const
00222 {
00223        return m_workStatus;
00224 }

00227 // protected methods
00228 
00229 template <class Product>
00230 bool TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InitializeWork()
00231 {
00232        return true;
00233 }
00234 
00235 
00236 template <class Product>
00237 const Product* TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetWorkProduct() const
00238 {
00239        const_cast< TSupplierCompWrap<Product>* >(this)->EnsureWorkFinished();
00240 
00241        if (m_workStatus == WS_OK){
00242               return m_productPtr.GetPtr();
00243        }
00244        else{
00245               return NULL;
00246        }
00247 }
00248 
00249 
00250 template <class Product>
00251 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::RegisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00252 {
00253        I_ASSERT(modelPtr != NULL);
00254        modelPtr->AttachObserver(&m_inputObserver);
00255 }
00256 
00257 
00258 template <class Product>
00259 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::UnregisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00260 {
00261        I_ASSERT(modelPtr != NULL);
00262        if (m_inputObserver.IsModelAttached(modelPtr)){
00263               modelPtr->DetachObserver(&m_inputObserver);
00264        }
00265 }
00266 
00267 
00268 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00269 
00270 template <class Product>
00271 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::OnComponentCreated()
00272 {
00273        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00274 
00275        if (m_paramsSetModelCompPtr.IsValid()){
00276               m_paramsSetModelCompPtr->AttachObserver(&m_inputObserver);
00277        }
00278 
00279        int inputsCount = m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr.GetCount();
00280        for (int i = 0; i < inputsCount; ++i){
00281               imod::IModel* inputModelPtr = m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr[i];
00282               if (inputModelPtr != NULL){
00283                      RegisterSupplierInput(inputModelPtr);
00284               }
00285        }
00286 
00287        m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_INVALID;
00288 }
00289 
00290 
00291 template <class Product>
00292 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::OnComponentDestroyed()
00293 {
00294        m_inputObserver.EnsureModelsDetached();
00295 
00296        BaseClass::OnComponentDestroyed();
00297 }

00314 template <class Product>
00315 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InputObserver::BeforeUpdate(imod::IModel* /*modelPtr*/, int /*updateFlags*/, istd::IPolymorphic* /*updateParamsPtr*/)
00316 {
00317        m_parent.InvalidateSupplier();
00318 }
